title: freedom call
content:
Hi! someone can help me to find this font? thanx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022085148im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Freedom_5879.jpg)
author: rockberto

comments.content:
It must be **[Gothferatu](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022085148/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Gothferatu%20-%20Regular&fid=59bab070a08c0f412c2bc162554967ca&fsize=60&text=Liue%20in%20Helluertia&fit=1)** by Jeff Bensch (free for personal use)

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022085148/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
